h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Red Tides Location
content: Red Tides can be obtained by defeating Guangzhi in Forest of Wolves - Outside the Forest area in Black Wind Mountain. He is located at the far back, past the small bridge in the forest.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Red_Tides.md', within the main section titled 'Red Tides', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Red Tides Location'.
The content is as follows:
Red Tides can be obtained by defeating Guangzhi in Forest of Wolves - Outside the Forest area in Black Wind Mountain. He is located at the far back, past the small bridge in the forest.
